project-basis: Use a connect to see around a room and bookmark specific objects
project-challenges: We had trouble with the kinect API and bookmarking objects into memory.
project-future-plans: Shelve it for now until we meet again at the next hackathon
project-inspiration: We wanted to help people find their remotes and phones and anything they might lose under the couch
project-lessons-learned: It's important to communicate with your team and experiences like this help you get to know your abilities better.
project-accomplishments: Working with the team and the limited resources we had we managed to work and have fun.
project-subtitle: A way to track commonly lost items in a living room for people with memory problems
